snippet: A woman whose brother was killed by a teenager works to keep other youngsters away from danger and temptation, but she fears that cuts in financing will hurt after-school programs, like the eight she runs.
abstract: A woman whose brother was killed by a teenager works to keep other youngsters away from danger and temptation, but she fears that cuts in financing will hurt after-school programs, like the eight she runs.

headline.main: Touched by Bloodshed, Working Now to Spare Others
headline.print_headline: Hurt by Crime, and Trying to Spare Others
